RumorFact.Text: The warp transmitter from "Glacial Abyss!" to the orrery station isn't on the north pole.

ExploreFact.Text: The warp transmitter from "Glacial Abyss!" to the orrery station is in the core of the planet.

RumorFact.Text: The ice on "Glacial Abyss!" is hollow and there is a subsurface ocean below it. A Nomai named Adonsonia theorized about the possibility of removing the ice.

ExploreFact.Text: The ice on "Glacial Abyss!" is hollow and I was able to reach the subsurface ocean below it.
There is a warp receiver on the equator of "Glacial Abyss!" under the ice.
Geysers are located beneath the ice on the surface of "Glacial Abyss!" near the north pole. A Nomai named Alnus mentioned that thawing the planet had increased its geothermal activity.
By accessing the geysers while the planet was frozen, I was able to descend to the planet's core.

RumorFact.Text: "Glacial Abyss!" has a hollow core connected to the geysers near the north pole. A Nomai teacher wanted her students to see something in the core.

ExploreFact.Text: "Glacial Abyss!" has a hollow core connected to the geysers near the north pole. It contains a viewing area for safely observing the layers of the planet.
The warp transmitter from "Glacial Abyss!" to the orrery station is in the core of the planet.
The core of "Glacial Abyss!" contains a door that is locked unless the system meets all project requirements.
